member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Describes a resource to resolve to at the conclusion of a render pass.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS.pSrcResource
member.summary: A pointer to an . The source resource.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS.pDstResource
member.summary: A pointer to an . The destination resource.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS.SubresourceCount
member.summary: A UINT. The number of subresources.

summary.para: A pointer to a constant array of . These subresources can be a subset of the render target's array slices, but you can't target subresources that aren't part of the render target view (RTV) or the depth/stencil view (DSV).
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] This pointer is directly referenced by the command list, and the memory for this array must remain alive and intact until is called.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS.Format
member.summary: A . The data format of the resources.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_PASS_ENDING_ACCESS_RESOLVE_PARAMETERS.PreserveResolveSource
member.summary: A BOOL. TRUE to preserve the resolve source, otherwise FALSE.
